model.name: endpointValidator
model.title: Endpoint Validator
model.description: To use a Camel endpoint to perform validation on the route level.
model.label: validation

ref.description: Set the reference of the Endpoint.

uri.description: Set the URI of the Endpoint.

type.description: Set the data type name. If you specify 'xml:XYZ', the validator will be picked up if message type is 'xml:XYZ'. If you specify just 'xml', the validator matches with all of 'xml' message type like 'xml:ABC' or 'xml:DEF'.
